Class MVString

java.lang.Object
  com.rocketsoftware.mvapi.utility.MVString

public class MVString
extends java.lang.Object

Provides limited set of multivalued string functions.

split

public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String buffer,
                                       java.lang.String delim)
Returns a string array build from spliting a string by the specified delimiter. Unlike the JDK split, this version does not drop empty substrings.

Parameters:
buffer - string to split
delim - a delimiter used for spliting
Returns:
string array
